programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: In one of her first roles, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' villain Cheng Pei Pei plays a kung-fu Nancy Drew who must face a secret serial killer.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han Hsiang directs this fascinating comedy about three couples and forbidden love across Macau and Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Secret of the Dirk
programme.desc: Lovely Ching Li and handsome Chang I unite as star-and-sword-crossed comrades who take on the vicious Black Tigers gang in a quest for hidden wealth.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: In Part 2 of this adventure, only the title weapons' union can save the 6 remaining sects which vie for mastery of the martial world.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: Ultimate combat is in the offing after King Eagle Chan Fei learns that Hung Ching Tien murdered their chief in a power struggle.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: Cheng Pei Pei stars as Hsiao-Yun, a young singer struggling to juggle her career and her relationship with her pianist lover.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chang Yi play a noble swordsman and a one-armed swordswoman who find themselves up against the evil Crimson Charm gang of thieves and thugs.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Serio-comic clashes of cultures ensue when a Mainland Chinese family try to make a go of it in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: This epic classic charts a romance between two teenage cousins, who pursue their relationship despite objections from their respective families.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The Mad Monk rushes around saving hawkers from crumbling walls and bullies, recovering stolen money and punishing a ruthless court official and his son.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: An ace swordsman fights evil, rescues women and takes part in duels to the death.

programme.title: Let's Fall in Love
programme.desc: Pressured by his parents to marry prior to taking over his father's business, Guan rejects every girl they find but then, he stumbles upon the perfect one?

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: This fascinating story of conflicting clans marks the beginning of Sun Chung's exploration of the kung fu genre.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After they reunite in a casino, two lovers (Lily Ho and Yueh Hua) vow to rid the place of corrupt military leaders and criminal others.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: Flipping a coin' takes on a whole new meaning in this action-packed, martial arts melodrama - because the pocket change is actually deadly kung-fu weapons.

programme.title: Forever and Ever
programme.desc: Huangmei Opera queen, Ivy Ling Po stars in this tale of a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter a girl who is dying.

programme.title: Angel With the Iron Fists
programme.desc: After her father is killed by gangsters, a young woman seeks revenge plus bids to ensure that justice is served. Starring Lily Ho.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This abourer and complex adaptation of a popular wuxia novel contains conspiracies, stratagems, and sword fights aplenty.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, this Huangmei Opera is a heady mix of love, betrayal, murder, and redemption.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A ruthless gang goes up against a millionaire's daughter who has one of three priceless Golden Buddha statues.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Problems ensue after one of two childhood friends who have vowed to become sisters through the exchange of bracelets gets married.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: This Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical depicts a turbulent romance between Yu Lan, a passionate tea picker and a charming fisherman named Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: With a focus on the pampered teenaged Jia Bao Yu, believed to be of supernatural origins, this Chinese classic depicts the Jia family's rise and fall.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: The famed Ivy Ling Po plays a mysterious swordswoman, who teams up with the Roving Knight in a battle against a string of intimidating villains.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: Set in the Han Dynasty, this drama depicts the legendary beauty Diao Chan, and how she used her charms to help her godfather eradicate corrupt court officials.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: In The Kung-fu Instructor, Ti Lung plays hero Huang Yang, a righteous weapon instructor whose main concern eventually becomes his survival.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a famed Chinese opera, this melodramatic film depicts the romance between Zhang Sheng, an impoverished scholar, and Ying Ying, who is from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: A Taiwanese crime masterpiece not to be missed! An investigation into a long-forgotten accident reveals an unimaginable dark truth.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: It's 1991. A university student meets a Taiwanese photographer at a concert at Beijing Workers' Stadium and thus, begins a whirlwind romance with far-reaching implications.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: Based on real-life events, this story features the different happenings in South Korea during the Asian Financial Crisis. Can they overcome the biggest crisis of the country?

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, starring Zhou Xun, Wallace Huo & Eddie Peng, this war flick with a stellar cast shines the light on true events surrounding the resistance groups' fight for independence.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a mission to protect Seobok, the first-ever human clone who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity.

programme.title: Sky on Fire
programme.desc: Directed by Ringo Lam, Daniel Wu stars as a security chief embroiled in a battle to protect a cure for deadly disease from falling into the wrong hands. Joseph Chang & Zhang Ruo Yun co-star.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: An inept kidnapper has the table turned on him by the wily businessman he kidnaps, and is coerced into doing his bidding. How will the story end for the captor and the captive?

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: After his incarceration, a former boxer learns that his wife has passed away, leaving behind a sick daughter. To get her to undergo treatment, he agrees to step into the ring again.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer & gamer Li Hao Ming is drawn into a shady hacking game after he is approached by mercenaries. Now, he must figure out who's friend, who's foe - and who's behind it all.

programme.title: Summer Love Love
programme.desc: Three very different men from Hong Kong, who are desperately lonely, end up facing countless challenges when they decide to seek love in Hainan, China.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: Perfect Imperfection
programme.desc: Starring Ady An, Ahn Jae Hyun & Alex Fong, this drama depicts the varying perspectives of love that drive two people born under the same horoscope sign - Virgo.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This incredible true story of real-life hero, Huo Yuan Jia, depicts how one man fights to balance the scales by taking on a list of ferocious opponents.

programme.title: I am Not Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Fan Bing Bing sacrificed her beauty to play an unattractive village woman and earned herself three Best Actress awards in this Feng Xiao Gang-helmed film that has won 14 international awards.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: When a killer begins targeting top martial arts masters, Ha Hou Mo, a convicted criminal, is released from custody to stop him. Yet, will Ha keep his word?

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley crew of friendly monsters.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Call of Heroes
programme.desc: Sean Lau, Louise Koo & Eddie Peng star in this action-packed story of a group of villagers who stand up to a cruel young warlord to protect their home.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: The fashionable Jackie Chan dishes out fast kicks, furious punches and driving tips in sartorial elegance.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: When a police chief arrests a Vietnam veteran, he sets in motion a series of events that lead to disaster and catastrophe.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed

programme.desc: An action-packed thriller about an ex-con who must go back outside the law to save his kidnapped son.

programme.desc: After the slaughter of his family by stone-cold mercenary, Hanzo Hasashi is exiled to the Netherrealm, where he's given a chance to avenge his family and is resurrected as Scorpion.

programme.desc: A group of lone warriors are forced to defeat a common foe and save their home of Jungle Village.

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: As a married couple hit 40, they start to reconsider some of the choices they've made.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: When a young child falsely accuses a man of a crime he did not commit, it sets off a chain of events that alter the lives of her loved ones forever.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Finding himself wanted by the FBI and the mob, a streetwise boy enlists the help of a lawyer to help him navigate the sea of single-minded prosecutors and protect him from the mobsters' reprisals.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: In a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances can be bought, a new and deadlier terrorist threat has emerged - free agent killers!

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Insecure S5 Ep04
programme.desc: The final season continues to follow our favorite characters as they evaluate their relationships, in an effort to figure out who and what comes with them in this next phase of their lives.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep04
programme.desc: Larry David stars as...Larry David in this acclaimed verite-style comedy series that follows him at home, at work and around town, as he lands himself in various predicaments.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Based on true events in the Battle of Midway, the film tells story of the leaders and soldiers who used their instincts, fortitude, and bravery to overcome the odds during World War II.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep08
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two female friends with very different ideals decide to start a beauty company together. One is more practical, while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars as the intrepid adventurer on the trail of a cult that enslaves children.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A recently murdered Chicago cop works with Heaven's police force to track the man who killed him.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Drug dealer Zu finds herself becoming the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music, a young non-verbal autistic girl. Explores two of Sia's favourite themes - finding one's voice and creating family.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Insecure S5 Ep04
programme.desc: The final season continues to follow our favorite characters as they evaluate their relationships, in an effort to figure out who and what comes with them in this next phase of their lives.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep04
programme.desc: Larry David stars as...Larry David in this acclaimed verite-style comedy series that follows him at home, at work and around town, as he lands himself in various predicaments.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: At a magical but remote island resort, lucky guests have their secret dreams realised. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the guests have to solve the island's mystery in order to escape.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: When a young child falsely accuses a man of a crime he did not commit, it sets off a chain of events that alter the lives of her loved ones forever.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: An all-star cast stars in this latest chapter of the worldwide hit franchise. This time, the Fockers and Byrnes brace themselves for the arrival of a baby.

programme.title: Fighting With My Family
programme.desc: Born into a wrestling family, Paige and her brother are ecstatic to try out for WWE.But when Paige earns a spot in the training program, she must leave her family and face this new, cut-throat world alone.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: The film centres on Christmas enthusiast party planners Ella and her sister, Marianne, who clash with their client, Edward, who is a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: A straight-laced man tries to play the field, but discovers that his heart will always be with his wife.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: A family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime when an ordinary girl assumes another person's identity.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Drug dealer Zu finds herself becoming the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music, a young non-verbal autistic girl. Explores two of Sia's favourite themes - finding one's voice and creating family.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: After a plane crash a young therapist Claire is assigned by her mentor to counsel the flight's five survivors. Claire is intrigued by Eric the most secretive of the passengers.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Trapped in a cave, a trio's only hope of escape is to go deep into the center of the Earth as they race against a volcanic eruption to reach the surface.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: When an Intelligence Officer learns that his wife may be working with the enemy in secret, he has only 3 days to prove her innocence and save his family.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A newly appointed nanny discovers that the two disturbed orphans she takes care of are harboring dark secrets.

programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla's barn.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Corny escapes from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups must light their way home! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a mine car! Ryder and the Pups must rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Daring Danny X does a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch but the wind flips him over! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger makes Rocky Kitty steal a pie from Mr. Porter's to join.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep119
programme.desc: ROBO G takes Calvin on a deep sea adventure to find what he needs to finish his underwater artwork. But when a school of jellyfish blocks them, Calvin must summon his PLAY POWER to finish his masterpiece.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Someone (or something) has stolen the snacks for the spooky surprise party! It's up to Calvin and ROBO G to use their PLAY POWER to find them - if the mysterious 'Count Snackula' doesn't find them first.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington makes a scrapbook of memories and tries to include everyone to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington tries to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's greenhouse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington has three chances to capture a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest, but he gets stage fright!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep142
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep143
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa likes the swings but George doesn't because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide as it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep504
programme.desc: When Mr. Grumpfish turns up in Happy Junction, he makes everyone in town really grumpy! Will Sheriff Molly find a way to help everyone handle their tricky emotions?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Before we can read, we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel and Pail act out 'Jack and Jill' and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep115
programme.desc: It's Bluestock - the Blue's Clues Music Concert! We figure out what song Blue wants to sing. Blue and Josh are excited to hear all of our musical friends sing including Magenta and Ally Brooke!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep420
programme.desc: It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! The first truck to cross the finish line wins the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep103
programme.desc: When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat dan telatah Elly, Epit, Kobi serta Abang Johan menceritakan pengalaman mereka dalam drama bersiri Elly & Epit yang pasti mencuit hati.

programme.title: Roket Kertas
programme.desc: Kisah sahabat baik, Aman dan Amin yang kudung kakinya cuba hidup seperti kanak-kanak lain. Dia sentiasa bersama kawan baiknya Aman yang juga mempunyai cita-cita yang sama iaitu ingin menjadi juruterbang.

programme.title: Bank Attack
